result.arabic_text: يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَرَضِيَ لَهُۥ قَوۡلٗا
result.translation: 109. Woo ayro Shafaaqatta abah yan numih Shafaaqatta numuh tu- maxiqta Racmaan kinni Rabbi Shafaaqatta kah abaanamih idini kah yeceeh Yalli maxco kak yikcineeh oggole numuh (moomintu kinnuk) aba kaa akke waytek.
